seller_research.name: Whatfix
seller_research.description: Whatfix is a digital adoption platform that provides in-app guidance, training, and performance support for web applications and software.

buyer_research.name: Infosys
buyer_research.description: Infosys is a global leader in next-generation digital services and consulting. We enable clients in more than 50 countries to navigate their digital transformation.
goals: Amplify human potential and create the next opportunity for people, businesses, and society
Enable clients to create and execute digital transformation
Improve the efficiency and effectiveness of clients' procurement and supply chain activities

pains: How can Whatfix help us enhance our software experience for our clients?
How does Whatfix address the digital transformation challenges we are facing?
What kind of support does Whatfix offer for large-scale businesses like ours?
Can Whatfix integrate with our existing systems and tools?
How can Whatfix help us improve the efficiency and effectiveness of our clients' procurement and supply chain activities?
What are the customization options available for our specific use case?
How does Whatfix ensure data security and compliance?
What kind of ROI can we expect from implementing Whatfix?
Can Whatfix help us achieve our goal of amplifying human potential and creating the next opportunity for people, businesses, and society?
How does Whatfix differentiate itself from its competitors in terms of features and pricing?
objections: We are already invested in WalkMe/Pendo/Userpilot, why should we switch to Whatfix?
We are concerned about the steep learning curve for our employees to adopt Whatfix.
Whatfix seems expensive, can you provide a custom quote for our specific needs?
We are not sure if Whatfix can scale with our growing business needs.
We have concerns about the data security and compliance of Whatfix.

Whatfix seems to have limited customization options, can you provide more information on this?
We are worried about the potential disruption to our business operations during the implementation process.

messages.content: Hello, thank you for taking the time to speak with me today. I'm excited to learn more about Infosys's goals and challenges. Can you start by sharing a little bit about your role and what brings you to this call?

Hi, I'm Ramesh, a Digital Transformation Consultant at Infosys. We're looking for ways to improve our clients' software experiences and enhance our own digital transformation capabilities. I came across Whatfix while researching digital adoption platforms.
Thank you for sharing that, Ramesh. Can you elaborate on what you mean by improving software experiences for your clients? What specific pain points are you trying to address?

Our clients are often struggling to adopt new software applications, which leads to low user engagement and inefficient use of technology investments. We're looking for a solution that can provide personalized onboarding, contextual help, and analytics to help us better understand user behavior.

I understand. It sounds like you're looking for a digital adoption platform that can help you streamline your clients' software adoption processes. Whatfix can definitely help with that. Our platform provides in-app guidance, training, and performance support for web applications and software. Can I ask, have you considered any other digital adoption platforms in the past?

Yes, we've evaluated WalkMe, Pendo, and Userpilot in the past. While they have some great features, we're concerned about the steep learning curve and limited customization options. We're looking for a solution that can integrate with our existing systems and provide better support for large-scale businesses like ours.

I understand your concerns. Whatfix is designed to be highly customizable and scalable to meet the needs of large enterprises like Infosys. Our platform can integrate with a wide range of systems and tools, and our support team is dedicated to ensuring a smooth implementation process. Can I walk you through a demo of our platform to show you how it can address your specific needs?
That would be great, thank you. I'd love to see how Whatfix can help us achieve our goals of amplifying human potential and creating the next opportunity for people, businesses, and society.

Absolutely. I'll share my screen and walk you through a demo of our platform. (Demo walk-through) As you can see, our platform provides a range of features that can help you improve user adoption, streamline software adoption processes, and enhance your clients' overall software experiences.

That's really impressive. I can see how Whatfix can help us address our pain points. Can you provide more information on your pricing model and what kind of ROI we can expect from implementing Whatfix?

Our pricing model is based on the number of users and the level of customization required. We offer a range of plans to fit the needs of different businesses. In terms of ROI, our customers have seen an average increase of 30% in user adoption rates and a 25% reduction in support requests. I can provide you with some case studies of similar companies that have seen success with Whatfix.
That sounds great. I'd love to see those case studies. Can you also provide more information on your implementation process and what kind of support you offer for large-scale businesses like ours?

Our implementation process typically takes 2-3 weeks, depending on the complexity of the project. We assign a dedicated customer success manager to work closely with your team to ensure a smooth implementation process. We also offer 24/7 support, as well as a range of training resources to help your team get the most out of our platform.
That sounds very reassuring. I think we're interested in moving forward with Whatfix. Can you provide a custom quote for our specific needs and outline the next steps in the process?

I'd be happy to provide a custom quote for your specific needs. I'll work with our sales engineering team to put together a proposal that outlines the scope of work, timeline, and pricing. I'll send it over to you within the next 24 hours. In terms of next steps, we can schedule a follow-up call to discuss the proposal and answer any further questions you may have.

objections: concerns about the steep learning curve
success_indicators: amplify human potential and create the next opportunity for people, businesses, and society
decision_committee: Ramesh, a Digital Transformation Consultant at Infosys

objection_resolution_pairs.objection: concerns about the steep learning curve
objection_resolution_pairs.resolution: Whatfix is designed to be highly customizable and scalable to meet the needs of large enterprises like Infosys. Our platform can integrate with a wide range of systems and tools, and our support team is dedicated to ensuring a smooth implementation process.

Whatfix provides a range of features that can help you improve user adoption, streamline software adoption processes, and enhance your clients' overall software experiences. Our platform is highly customizable to meet the specific needs of your business.

insights: Infosys is looking for a digital adoption platform that can help them improve their clients' software experiences and enhance their own digital transformation capabilities.
Whatfix's platform can provide personalized onboarding, contextual help, and analytics to help Infosys better understand user behavior.
Infosys has evaluated other digital adoption platforms in the past, including WalkMe, Pendo, and Userpilot, but has concerns about the steep learning curve and limited customization options.
improvements: The seller could have asked more questions about Infosys's current software adoption processes and pain points to better understand their needs.
The seller could have provided more specific examples of how Whatfix's platform has helped similar companies in the past.
The seller could have emphasized Whatfix's differentiators, such as advanced analytics and AI-powered guidance, to further differentiate themselves from competitors.

features.name: Digital Adoption Platform
features.description: A platform that provides in-app guidance, training, and performance support for web applications and software.

features.name: In-App Guidance
features.description: Provides step-by-step guidance to users within the application.

features.name: User Support
features.description: Offers real-time support to users through contextual help and messages.

features.name: Contextual Messages
features.description: Delivers personalized messages to users based on their actions and behavior within the application.

features.name: Simulated Training
features.description: Allows users to practice and complete tasks in a simulated environment.

features.name: Application Analytics
features.description: Provides insights into user behavior and application usage to improve adoption and ROI.

features.name: Personalized Onboarding
features.description: Creates customized onboarding experiences for users based on their roles, goals, and behavior.

features.name: Advanced Analytics
features.description: Offers robust analytics to help businesses understand user behavior and make data-driven decisions.

features.name: AI-Powered Guidance
features.description: Uses artificial intelligence to provide intelligent and contextual guidance to users.

features.name: Enterprise-Level Security
features.description: Ensures the security and integrity of user data and application usage.

messages.content: Hello, everyone from Infosys! Thank you for taking the time to join today's demo call. I'm excited to showcase how Whatfix can help you improve user adoption, reduce support requests, and amplify human potential. Before we dive in, I just want to confirm that we have Ramesh, our primary decision-maker, on the call.
Yes, I'm here. Thank you for having us. We're looking forward to seeing how Whatfix can help us address our pain points.

Excellent! Let's start with a brief overview of our Digital Adoption Platform. This platform provides in-app guidance, training, and performance support for web applications and software. We've seen significant improvements in user adoption rates and reductions in support requests with our current clients.

Now, let me demonstrate how our In-App Guidance feature can help users navigate your software applications more efficiently. As you can see, our step-by-step guidance is highly customizable and can be tailored to meet your specific business needs.
That's impressive. But how do you handle complex software applications with multiple workflows?

We've worked with numerous clients who have complex software applications. Our AI-Powered Guidance feature uses artificial intelligence to provide intelligent and contextual guidance to users, even in the most complex workflows. Additionally, our Advanced Analytics feature provides robust insights into user behavior, allowing you to identify areas for improvement and optimize your application's performance.

Let me show you an example of how our Contextual Messages feature can deliver personalized messages to users based on their actions and behavior within the application. This feature has been incredibly effective in reducing support requests and improving user engagement.
We've tried similar features with other digital adoption platforms, but they didn't quite meet our needs. How do you ensure that your platform can meet our specific requirements?

I completely understand your concerns. At Whatfix, we pride ourselves on our ability to customize our platform to meet the unique needs of our clients. We've worked with numerous enterprises, including those in the IT consulting space, and have a proven track record of delivering tailored solutions. If there are specific features or customizations you need, we're more than happy to work with you to develop them.

Before I move forward, I want to address some of the concerns you mentioned earlier, such as the steep learning curve. I want to assure you that our platform is designed to be highly scalable and easy to implement. We've had clients who have seen significant improvements in user adoption rates within just a few weeks of implementation.
That's reassuring to hear. Can you share some success stories or case studies from similar clients?

Absolutely. We've worked with numerous clients in the IT consulting space, including companies like Accenture and Deloitte. In fact, one of our clients, a large IT consulting firm, saw a 30% reduction in support requests and a 25% increase in user adoption rates within the first six months of implementation. I can share some case studies with you after the call if you're interested.

Let me summarize what we've covered so far. We've demonstrated how our Digital Adoption Platform can help you improve user adoption rates, reduce support requests, and amplify human potential. We've also addressed your concerns about the steep learning curve and limited customization options. Are there any other questions or concerns you'd like to discuss?
No, I think that covers everything. Thank you for the comprehensive demo. We'll review the information and discuss next steps internally.

You're welcome, Ramesh. I'll send over the presentation, as well as some additional resources, for your reference. If you have any further questions or need any clarification on anything, please don't hesitate to reach out. We're excited about the possibility of working together and look forward to hearing from you soon.

messages.content: Hi Ramesh, thank you for taking the time to discuss the pricing model for Whatfix. I understand that you've had a chance to review the demo and we're excited to move forward. Can you start by sharing your thoughts on the demo and what you're looking to get out of our digital adoption platform?

Yes, thank you for the demo. It was very informative and we're impressed with the features. We're looking to improve user adoption rates and reduce support requests. We also want to make sure that the platform can be customized to meet our specific business needs.

Absolutely, our platform is designed to be highly customizable and scalable to meet the needs of large enterprises like Infosys. Now, let's discuss our pricing models. We offer a range of options to fit your business needs. We have a Free plan with 30 credits, a Basic plan for up to 2500 users at $39/month, a Growth plan for up to 10,000 users at $499/month, and an Enterprise plan for large-scale businesses with a custom quote. We also offer a Per-Application Fee model with a flat fee plus user license fees, also with a custom quote.

That's helpful, thank you. We're concerned about the steep learning curve and limited customization options. Can you walk us through how you handle implementation and customization for large enterprises like ours?

I completely understand your concerns. We've worked with numerous large enterprises and have a proven track record of delivering tailored solutions. Our implementation process is designed to be smooth and efficient, and our support team is dedicated to ensuring a successful rollout. We also offer customization options to meet specific business needs, and our AI-Powered Guidance feature can help users navigate even the most complex workflows.
That sounds promising. What kind of ROI can we expect from implementing Whatfix?

Our clients have seen significant ROI from implementing Whatfix. For example, one of our clients, a large IT consulting firm, saw a 30% reduction in support requests and a 25% increase in user adoption rates within the first six months of implementation. We can provide a customized ROI analysis based on your specific business needs and goals.
That's impressive. What kind of budget are we looking at for the Enterprise plan?

We can work with you to create a custom quote that fits your budget constraints. However, we typically see a significant reduction in costs associated with support requests and user adoption. We can also offer flexible pricing options to meet your needs.
We're looking to make a decision within the next 24 hours. Can you provide a proposal that outlines the details of the Enterprise plan and the custom quote?

Absolutely, I can have that proposal sent over to you within the next few hours. We're excited about the opportunity to work with Infosys and help you achieve your digital transformation goals. Are there any other concerns or questions you have at this point?
No, that's all for now. Thank you for your time and we look forward to reviewing the proposal.

You're welcome, Ramesh. It was a pleasure speaking with you and I'm confident that Whatfix can help Infosys achieve its goals. I'll follow up with the proposal and we can discuss next steps. Thank you again for your time.

messages.content: Hi Ramesh, thanks for taking the time to discuss the next steps for implementing Whatfix at Infosys. I understand that you've had a chance to review our demo and discuss internally. Can you share your thoughts on where you stand in terms of moving forward?

Yes, thank you for following up. We've had a good discussion internally, and we're interested in moving forward. However, we do have some concerns that we'd like to address before finalizing the deal.
Absolutely, Ramesh. I'm happy to help address any concerns you may have. What are some of the key issues that you'd like to discuss?
Well, one of our primary concerns is the steep learning curve. We've had issues with user adoption in the past, and we want to make sure that Whatfix can help us improve that.

I completely understand, Ramesh. Whatfix is designed to be highly customizable and scalable to meet the needs of large enterprises like Infosys. Our platform can integrate with a wide range of systems and tools, and our support team is dedicated to ensuring a smooth implementation process. Can I walk you through some of our success stories with similar clients who've seen significant improvements in user adoption rates?
That sounds great. We'd love to hear more about that. But we're also concerned about the limited customization options. Can you show us how Whatfix can be tailored to our specific business needs?

Whatfix provides a range of features that can help you improve user adoption, streamline software adoption processes, and enhance your clients' overall software experiences. Our platform is highly customizable to meet the specific needs of your business. I'd be happy to provide a customized demo to show you how our platform can be tailored to your needs.
Okay, that sounds good. We'd also like to discuss the contract terms and procurement process. What are your typical terms, and how does the procurement process work?

We're flexible when it comes to contract terms and procurement processes. We've worked with numerous enterprises and understand the importance of meeting your needs. We can offer a customized contract that meets your requirements. In terms of procurement, we've worked with procurement teams in the past and are happy to provide any necessary information to facilitate the process.
That's good to hear. We'd also like to discuss the pricing model. Can you provide some flexibility in terms of discounts and concessions to meet our budget constraints?

I understand that budget constraints are an important consideration. Whatfix is committed to providing a flexible pricing model that meets your needs. We can offer a customized pricing plan that takes into account your budget constraints and provides the necessary ROI to justify the investment. Let me see what I can do to provide some concessions that meet your needs.

After reviewing your requirements, I'm happy to offer a 10% discount on our standard pricing model. This should help meet your budget constraints and provide a clear ROI on your investment. What are your thoughts on this proposal?
That sounds good. We'll need to discuss this internally and get back to you. Can you provide a summary of the proposal, including the customized pricing plan and contract terms?

Absolutely, Ramesh. I'll send over a summary of the proposal, including the customized pricing plan and contract terms, within the next 24 hours. If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out. We're looking forward to working with Infosys and helping you achieve your digital transformation goals.
